scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js" "netlify dev --port=8888"
scripts.start-test: npm run build-test && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js-test" "netlify dev --port=8888"
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify -p esmify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] -t uglifyify --debug src/index.js > public/bundle.js
scripts.copy: mkdir -p public && cp src/index.html public && cp src/*.svg public && mkdir -p public/icon && cp src/manifest.webmanifest public && cp src/service-worker.js public && cp src/icon/* public/icon && cp src/favicons/* public
scripts.watch-js: watchify -p esmify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV test ] -t uglifyify src/index.js -d -v -o public/bundle.js
scripts.cypress-test: npx browserify -p esmify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV cypress ] --debug src/index.js > public/bundle.js && concurrently --kill-others "npx netlify dev --port=8888" "npm run watch-js" "cypress open"
